findings.title: Elevated Impact of Smart Contract Owner Privileges
findings.description: Active smart contract owner privileges constitute an elevated impact to smart contract's safety and security.

findings.title: Blacklisting Wallets
findings.description: Smart contract owner can blacklist certain wallets from interacting with the contract function modules.

findings.title: Changing Transaction Fees
findings.description: Smart contract owner can change transaction fees, which may be used to impose extraordinary transaction fees.

findings.title: Changing Max Transaction and Wallet %
findings.description: Smart contract owner can change max transaction and wallet % without any arbitrary limit set.
findings.location: Max Transaction and Wallet % Change Function Module

findings.title: Low Severity Issue - Functional Vulnerability Possible
findings.description: The smart contract has a low severity issue that may or may not create any functional vulnerability.
